item.title: Docs: .activate_all_osm_waterway_types()
item.description:
Description

Option to activate all supported OSM waterway types in the parser, resulting in the most detailed network possible.

Signature

.activate_all_osm_waterway_types()

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# indicate to activate all supported OSM waterway types
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.railway_settings.activate_all_osm_waterway_types()

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .activate_osm_water_mode(+)
item.description:
Description

Activate chosen OSM water mode.

Currently, only a single water mode exists (ferry) and this is active by default when the waterway parser is activated. Therefore it is unlikely this method needs to be used in most cases.

Signature

.activate_osm_water_mode(mode: str)

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
mode str None N/A OSM water mode that is to be activated

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# activate ferry from the water modes to parse (Default is that this is already activated)
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.activate_osm_water_mode("ferry")

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .activate_osm_waterway_type(+)
item.description:
Description

Activate selected OSM waterway type explicitly on top of the default activated types.

The provided types need to be in line with the OSM waterway types’ name as outlined in the defaults section

Signature

.activate_osm_waterway_type(waterway_type: str)

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_type str None N/A Explicitly activated OSM waterway type

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# indicate to activate "ferry=primary" explicitly
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.activate_osm_waterway_type("primary")

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .activate_osm_waterway_types(+)
item.description:
Description

Activate selected OSM waterway types explicitly on top of the default activated types.

The provided types need to be in line with the OSM waterway types’ name as outlined in the defaults section

Signature

.activate_osm_waterway_types(waterway_types: List[str])

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_types List of str None N/A Explicitly activated OSM waterway types

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# indicate to activate "ferry=primary" and "ferry=secondary" explicitly
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.activate_osm_waterway_types(["primary", "secondary"])

See also

N/A

Source code

item.title: Docs: .deactivate_all_osm_water_modes_except(+)
item.description:
Description

Deactivate all OSM water modes except the ones indicated.

Currently, ferry is the only water mode considered, so likely there is no need to use this method at this point

Signature

.deactivate_all_osm_water_modes_except(modes: List[str])

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
modes List of String None N/A OSM water modes that are not to be deactivated

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# deactivate all modes except ferry
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.deactivate_all_osm_water_modes_except(["ferry"])

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .deactivate_all_osm_water_modes()
item.description:
Description

Deactivate all OSM water modes.

Signature

.deactivate_all_osm_water_modes()

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# deactivate all water modes (but do parse the water routes themselves)
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.deactivate_all_osm_water_modes()

See also

N/A

Source code

Deactivate all OSM waterway types except the ones indicated.

The provided types need to be in line with the OSM waterway types’ name as outlined in the defaults section

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# deactivate all except regular ferry routes (`route=ferry`)
osm_reader.settings.activate_waterway_parser(True)
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.deactivate_all_osm_waterway_types_except(["ferry"])

Deactivate a selected OSM waterway type explicitly.

network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader

item.title: Docs: .get_default_speed_limit_by_osm_waterway_type(+)
item.description:
Description

Get the current default speed limit (km/h) for a given waterway type.

Waterways can be tagged in various ways, e.g., route=ferry, or ferry=<some_highway_type>. Both types of values ferry and/or a highway type - such as primary, secondary`, etc., can be provided here.

Signature

.get_default_speed_limit_by_osm_waterway_type(waterway_type: str) -> float

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_type str None N/A The OSM water way type’s speed limit

Return type

float

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# example Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# get the default speed limit for ferry crossing
speed_km_h = osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.get_default_speed_limit_by_osm_waterway_type("primary")

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .is_osm_waterway_type_activated(+)
item.description:
Description

Verify if a given waterway type is activated. When activated the parser will consider the type, when deactivated it is ignored when parsing.

Waterways can be tagged in various ways, e.g., route=ferry, or ferry=<some_highway_type>. Both types of values ferry and/or a highway type - such as primary, secondary`, etc., can be provided here.

Signature

.is_osm_waterway_type_activated(waterway_value_type: str)-> bool

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_value_type str None N/A Verify the OSM water way type

Return type

bool

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# example Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# Verify if a ferry crossing for primary roads has been acivated
assert osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.is_osm_waterway_type_activated("primary") is True

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .is_osm_waterway_type_deactivated(+)
item.description:
Description

Verify if a given waterway type is deactivated. When activated the parser will consider the type, when deactivated it is ignored when parsing.

Waterways can be tagged in various ways, e.g., route=ferry, or ferry=<some_highway_type>. Both types of values ferry and/or a highway type - such as primary, secondary`, etc., can be provided here.

Signature

.is_osm_waterway_type_deactivated(waterway_value_type: str)-> bool

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_value_type str None N/A Verify the OSM water way type

Return type

bool

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# example Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# Verify if a ferry crossing for primary roads has been deacivated
assert osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.is_osm_waterway_type_deactivated("primary") is False

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py

item.title: Docs: .overwrite_capacity_max_density_defaults(+)
item.description:
Description

Override the default capacity (pcu/h/lane) and maximum density (pcu/km/lane) for the given OSM waterway type.

Original defaults are country specific and when no country is provided to the reader, the global defaults will be in place.

The provided types need to be in line with the OSM waterway types’ name as outlined in the defaults section

This property is made available but for waterways, yet it generally makes less sense to use than for, let’s say’ roads. Mostly relevant in case of ferry crossings that carry for example cars.

Signature

.overwrite_capacity_max_density_defaults(highway_type: str, capacity: float, max_density: float)

with

Parameter Type Unit Default Description
waterway_type str None N/A OSM waterway type to set the new defaults for
capacity float pcu/h/lane N/A New capacity to use
max_density float pcu/km/lane N/A New maximum density to use

Return type

N/A

Example 1

from planit import *

# create a network converter
planit_instance = Planit()
network_converter = planit_instance.converter_factory.create(ConverterType.NETWORK)

# Open Street Map (OSM) network reader        
osm_reader = network_converter.create_reader(NetworkReaderType.OSM, "<country_name>")
osm_reader.settings.set_input_file("<path_to_input_file>")

# set new defaults for capacity and max density on ferry=motorway links
osm_reader.settings.waterway_settings.overwrite_capacity_max_density_defaults("motorway", 200, 175)

See also

N/A

Source code

Class OsmWaterwaySettingsWrapper in converterwrappers.py
